name: Name
recommend_max_ten_life_areas: We recommend keeping the number of life areas around 10 for the best overview.
local_storage_not_available: Warning: Local Storage is not available. Your data will not be saved.
unsaved_changes_warning: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to continue?
remove_life_area_warning: Warning: This will remove the life area and all its data. Do you want to continue?
reset_life_compass_warning: Are you sure you want to reset the life areas to default?
remove_all_life_areas_warning: Warning: This will remove all life areas and all data. Do you want to continue?
life_compass_subtitle: Discover your life balance. Create your life compass.
attribution_message: This application was built with care using modern frameworks and tools. We are grateful to the open source community and all contributors for providing the resources that made this project possible.
brief_life_compass_intruction:
The Life Compass consists of ten areas that are typically important to most people. In each box, write down a few words about what you would value or consider important in that particular area. Each area also includes two small boxes. In the left box, rate how important each area is in your life on a scale from 1 to 10, where 1 means unimportant and 10 means very important. Base your rating on how life would be if everything were exactly as you wanted it to be.  

 In the right box, rate how much you have lived in accordance with your values in the past week, where 1 means not at all and 10 means completely in line with your values. Then, examine the differences between these numbers. Can you identify any areas that are important to you but where you are not living as you would like? If so, reflect on what is preventing you!
